# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: Conveyor Maintenance and Repair Services

### Contract Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of conveyor maintenance and repair services located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

### Key Information

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3527148657
* **Publication Date:** August 18, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 12, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** July 31, 2024

### Contract Requirements

The successful bidder will be responsible for providing conveyor maintenance and repair services for the Department of National Defence (DND) located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Luc Brunet
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Email: luc.brunet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Bid Submissions

All bid submissions must be received by September 12, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Document Attachments

No additional documents are attached to this tender announcement.

### Notice URL
